What’s inside the report

✓
Timeline across permits and revisions
✓
Status snapshot (issued/finaled/expired/void when public)
✓
Approved scope summary (what the record actually says)
✓
Open items (missing finals, corrections/notes if available)
✓
Risk flags (common red flags summarized clearly)
✓
Source bundle (portal exports + retrieved docs if requested)

Why this matters

✓
Quoting: confirm scope before you price labor/material
✓
Buying: identify open exposure before escrow closes
✓
Closeout: see what’s blocking final and what’s missing
✓
Speed: avoid portal rabbit holes and vague screenshots

Public records only. Some documents may be restricted or require owner authorization. Research + document retrieval support only. Not legal advice.

FAQ

Do you cover LADBS and surrounding cities?

Yes. Text the address and you’ll get feasibility confirmation for your jurisdiction and requested depth.

Can you retrieve documents in person?

When available through public counters/records offices. Some items may be restricted; you’ll get clear next steps if authorization is needed.
